attributes.action: Demand accountability for lies told in 2016 referendum campaign to leave EU
attributes.additional_details:
A leading figure in this campaign was Boris Johnson. A man who could soon become the unelected prime minister and allow the UK to crash out of the EU with no deal. 
This is unacceptable. Demand accountability.
attributes.background:
The leave campaign have admitted they told lies in the run up to the 2016 EU referendum. This includes the infamous ‘£350 million for the NHS’ statement on the side of a bus. 
No one has been held accountable.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
